about_the_game:
Angels, Cards, Battle! Unite the legends to prevent the resurrection of the evil forces!

A fantastic story of heroes joining forces with angels to stop the evil forces.

1. Diverse Game Modes:

  • Dive into an exciting anime Trading Card Game featuring intense PvP battles, immersive PvE missions, and thrilling Roguelike gameplay experiences!

2) Extensive Card Collection:

  • Collect over 100 beautifully designed anime characters. Assemble your team of angels and prepare your strategic deck to dominate every battle!

3) Trading card game requires intricate strategies

  • Conquer Your Opponents with a Wide Array of Strategic Tactics! Achieve Victory by Mastering Diverse Approaches in the Game!

1. Adventure (Roguelike) 

  • Deck Requirement: 40 cards

  • Challenge: Win all 10+ matches, including the formidable Boss, consecutively to conquer the mode.

  • Unique Feature: Experience our original skill system, exclusive to our TCG, offering fresh strategic depth unlike any other game.

2. Training (Ruins of Trials) 

  • Deck Requirement: 20 cards

  • Gameplay: Engage in classic TCG battles to hone your skills.

  • Rewards: Climb the levels and unlock better rewards as you advance!

3. Arena (PvP) ⚔️

  • Battle System: Compete against other players in thrilling PvP matches. Earn Battle Points and climb rank tiers that accurately reflect your standing in the game. Enjoy exclusive rewards based on your rank tier!

4. Card Enhancement 

  • Upgrade System: Enhance all your playable cards by combining them with upgrade + material cards and strengthen your deck to gain the upper hand in every battle!

5. Card Shop

  • Find rare and powerful cards to build your ultimate deck.

6. Card Collection

  • View all the cards you've collected in one place. This feature will allow you to easily manage and strategize your deck!

7. Tutorial

  • Follow our player-friendly, step-by-step tutorial and get ready to dive into the game in no time.

  • Avid TCG & CCG Enthusiasts : Perfect for dedicated Trading Card Game (TCG) and Collectible Card Game (CCG) players seeking their next thrilling challenge.!

  • Competitive Legends : Designed for players who thrive on intense, competitive matches against other top-tier Legends. Prove your strategy and rise to the top!

Experience stunning visuals with concept art initially crafted using AI technology, then refined by our illustrators to deliver breathtaking final designs.

Whether you're a seasoned card strategist, a fierce competitor, or an art lover, our game offers something special just for you! Join us now and become part of an extraordinary gaming adventure!

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 AMD Radeon HD 6950
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must be at 64-bit
